summary: Test module that validates the Prefect CLI's server start command correctly forwards termination signals (e.g., Ctrl‑Break, SIGINT, SIGTERM) to a Uvicorn process, ensuring graceful shutdown and proper escalation when needed.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable lifecycle management of the Prefect server across operating systems by confirming that signal handling behaves as expected, thereby preventing orphaned processes and ensuring clean shutdowns.
